patthana16.61:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.61:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.61:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:5.3: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
